metadata.name: LTSFLWR #1
metadata.description:
Flower 1 of 6

"Lotus Flower" is a series of only six generative art pieces created in 2019. 

Music is the core engine of these pieces; with a custom-made algorithm, the software generates these abstract shapes like flowers. The sounds contribute to deciding their colour and shape. 

Each artwork is 35x35cm big with a resolution of 300 DPI, perfect for high-resolution art print.
